about_the_game:
Waifu Beach Bar is a casual simulator where you work as a bartender in the most popular beaches of the world. Beautiful girls dressed in bikinis come to your establishment, get ready to quench their thirst!

Interact with the girls to see what drink they'd like, and serve it as fast as you can. The faster you go, the more generous the tip will be! You will need to save up money to unlock special equipment, upgrades and locations, all of them being necessary to complete the game.

Mix drinks like crazy! There are 30 different drinks the customers may want. It's better to start slow though, so you will unlock most of the drinks as you gain experience as a bartender! Once the drinks are ready to go, you may want to use the tray that allows you to transport up to 5 different drinks at once, but be careful though, you will need a good balance or you may spill them over the floor!

content_descriptors.notes: This game may include content not suited for certain ages or to be seen at work: there is partial nudity and has been targeted for adults.

Minimum:
